short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your web experience with mesmerizing space backgrounds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It changes the background of (almost) all Websites to a galaxy themed background. Lets make the world wide web a more starful place!

It's local, don't worry, it wont break the internet, just refresh to go back to the bland original website.
